author: DarwinJS
body:
Steps to reproduce
------------------

```
Get-Help about_psreadline

```

Expected behavior
-----------------

```
Name                              Category  Module                    Synopsis
----                              --------  ------                    --------
about_PSReadLine                  HelpFile  PSReadLine

```

Actual behavior
---------------

```
Name                              Category  Module                    Synopsis
----                              --------  ------                    --------
about_PSReadLine                  HelpFile
```

Environment data
----------------

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

```powershell
> $PSVersionTable
Name                           Value
----                           -----
PSVersion                      6.1.0
PSEdition                      Core
GitCommitId                    6.1.0
OS                             Microsoft Windows 10.0.17134
Platform                       Win32NT
PSCompatibleVersions           {1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 4.0...}
PSRemotingProtocolVersion      2.3
SerializationVersion           1.1.0.1
WSManStackVersion              3.0
```
title: PowerShell conceptual help does not display module even when one is relevant
